Class AdminRequestsTest

java.lang.Object
tests.database.BaseDatabaseTest
tests.database.tests.AdminRequestsTest
@TestMethodOrder(org.junit.jupiter.api.MethodOrderer.OrderAnnotation.class) public class AdminRequestsTest extends BaseDatabaseTest
Unit tests for AdminRequests repository.

Covers: create, read, update, delete, state-only update, filter queries, and validator edge-cases for all three AdminActions types.

Author:
Dhruv
